title: Player [removed]
body:
This player "[removed]" has been telling his teammates to kill themselves and although we did have fun with the other enemies, nobody appreciates people like this and one of the enemies informed me that he was hacking in a game 2 games ago. "[removed]" also said it was his first time league even though i checked his profile and he was level 40. Riot, please remove people like this from League Of Legends because the enemies had lost 25LP for no apparent reason and we did not earn the LP.

[link removed]

I hope riot decides to ban this account

replies.body: You need to log a support case to bring it to Riot's attention beyond what you already did with the report in game.
Lol he player name gonna get removed
